Text: HI SHELLEYHi Shelley Just a note to let you know that I have been looking for work and have applied and interviewed for several positions in gas control If you have any other openings available within the pipeline group in scheduling contracts or accounting I would appreciate any assistance you can offer As you well know I have a good work history and would be anxious to hear any input from you I really do need a job Thanks for your time Georgi Landau

RE HI SHELLEYThank you so much Shelley I too am sad that this all happened to Enron I have been in touch with Rick Mike and Steve but I will send an email to Lynn to cover all the basis and I appreciate your touching base with them also Thanks again Georgi Original Message From Corman Shelley mailtoShelley NRONcom Sent Tuesday February AM To Georgi Landau Subject RE HI SHELLEY Hi Georgi Its nice to hear from you although I wish it were under happier circumstances from your end I know that your visited with Mike and Steve on gas control openings Please also keep in touch with Rick Dietz for contract group openings and Lynn Blair for potential scheduling openings Ill also touch base with them and let them know that you may be responding to upcoming job postings Original Message From Georgi Landau mailto Sent Sunday February PM To Corman Shelley Subject HI SHELLEY Importance High Hi Shelley Just a note to let you know that I have been looking for work and have applied and interviewed for several positions in gas control If you have any other openings available within the pipeline group in scheduling contracts or accounting I would appreciate any assistance you can offer As you well know I have a good work history and would be anxious to hear any input from you I really do need a job Thanks for your time Georgi Landau
